video_prompt: Person's flowing hair gently sways. Rainbow light shifts across their dewy face. Tulips subtly bloom and deepen in color. Translucent butterflies softly flutter, changing positions around the person. Their lips subtly part.
image_prompt: Vibrant, ethereal portrait of a person with dark flowing hair, close-up, low-angle, looking up. Rainbow light refraction on dewy skin. Surrounded by purple tulips and glowing, translucent blue and purple butterflies. Dreamy, magical atmosphere with purples, pinks, and soft blues. Vertical orientation.
refined_video_prompt: Hair gently sways. Rainbow light gracefully shifts across the face. Tulips subtly bloom, their colors deepening. Butterflies softly flutter, constantly repositioning around the person. Lips delicately part.
